Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.fieldText: Is this application part of an existing project?

fields.name: Total_Number_of_Roads_Being_Proposed
fields.fieldText: Total Number of Roads Being Proposed

fields.name: Road_Name_Guidelines_and_Supplemental_Information
fields.fieldText: Road Name Guidelines and Supplemental Information

fields.name: Road_Name_Guidelines
fields.fieldText:
The following guidelines must be followed. Please note that the Town of Clayton reserves the right to not approve any street name that is deemed inappropriate or fails to meet the guidelines.


  1. No street names duplicate or sound similar to existing road names.
  2. None of the streets are names after individuals.
  3. Street names have been limited to 14 characters or less.
  4. No compass directions are included in the street names (north, south, east, west).
  5. Punctuation marks are not used in the street names (e.g. periods, hyphens, apostrophes, etc.).
  6. Double suffixes have been avoided (e.g. Deer Path Lane).
  7. Names that are difficult to pronounce have been avoided.
  8. All names have acceptable suffixes (e.g. Street, Drive, Court, Lane, etc.). Use the toggle below to see the Town of Clayton’s approved list of suffixes with details.

fields.name: Road_Name_Table_Info
fields.fieldText:
﻿Please submit twice as many road names as needed with highest priority names listed first, written exactly as they should appear on the sign. The Town of Clayton Planning Department will coordinate with the Johnston County Planning Department for joint approval of street names. The Town of Clayton Planning Department will provide the applicant the final approval of street names. Approved street names are reserved for one year.


Please submit road names below.

fields.name: Fourteen_Characters_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Proposed street names must be 14 characters or less.

fields.name: Street_Names_Table_Help_Text
fields.fieldText: Click the Add Row button to enter street names.

textTemplates.name: Approved_Suffixes
textTemplates.text:
Suffixes and Abbreviations (A-E)
AVE BLVD BND CIR CT CTR CV DR EXPY
Avenue Boulevard Bend Circle Court Center Cove Drive Expressway
Suffixes and Abbreviations (E-P)
EXT FWY GTWY HWY LN LOOP PARK PATH PKWY
Extension Freeway Gateway Highway Lane Loop Park Path Parkway
Suffixes and Abbreviations (P-Z)
PL PT RDG SQ ST TRCE TRL WALK WAY
Place Point Ridge Square Street Trace Trail Walk Way
